　SD Gundam GX
　G Generation Series
*☆ indicates scenario recordings.


https://store.steampowered.com/app/728530/SD_GUNDAM_G_GENERATION_CROSS_RAYS

item.title: Funny Football
item.description:
About This Game

This is a casual football game. You can control the movement of two football players by your two hands respectively at the same time. It is definitely a challenge to do so, and you sometimes may try to use the keys of football player #1 to control player #2 since those two players will continuously switch position. However, this is the fun part of this game, especially when you play the local PVP mode. The person who makes less mistakes and catches more opportunities will get the final victory. Besides this, this game also provides some other modes like 1v1, 2v2 with AI team member for people who do not enjoy multi task.

This game is currently still on test stage, and we will add more features and game modes into it in the future. It is also possible to make an online PVP mode and create a rank system for it if we get enough support.

Please be free to leave any comments and feedbacks, and they are important for us to keep improving this game.

item.title: Fractal Glide
item.description:
About This Game

About Fractal Glide

Welcome to the captivating world of Fractal Glide, where exploration meets artistry in a symphony of mathematical beauty.

Inspiration

Fractal Glide was born from a deep appreciation for fractals — those infinitely complex, self-replicating patterns found throughout nature and mathematics. These mesmerizing forms have captivated scientists, artists, and dreamers for generations. They offer a glimpse into the hidden order of the universe, a place where mathematics and art intertwine.

The Journey Begins

In Fractal Glide, you take on the role of an intrepid robot explorer navigating a universe of fractal landscapes. As you glide through these extraordinary realms, you'll collect points, make breathtaking discoveries, and witness the sheer beauty of fractals coming to life. But, be careful not to crash!

Features


  • Diverse Fractal Worlds: Immerse yourself in a variety of stunning fractal environments, each with its unique character and challenges.
  • Points and Progression: Collect points as you explore, allowing you to unlock new areas and new robots and delve deeper into the fractal cosmos.
  • Art and Exploration: Fractal Glide is more than a game; it's an artistic experience. Every fractal landscape is a work of art, waiting for you to uncover its secrets.
  • Endless Discovery: With a growing collection of fractal patterns, each playthrough offers a new chance to explore the infinite.

item.title: Bounce ASMR
item.description:
About This Game

You're having a boring day and don't know what to do? Did your teacher give you a failing grade in math because you didn't know the area of the square? Then the best solution to relax is Bounce ASMR!

You can simulate the movements and jumps of the geometric shape as you like!

In total you have the Square, Circle, Triangle, Pentagon and Hexagon. (only the Square you get, the others are included in the DLCs, but that's ok, they are only worth one euro! )

What are you waiting for? I say start the game and relax your eyes a bit.

item.title: The Twilight Witch
item.description:
About This Game

A village attacked by a mysterious figure. A Guardian, dead in it's defense. And you, left to tell the wider world of what happened. In this top-down RPG, you play as Mael, a young human whose home is befell by foul forces, only to find themselves tasked with finding help in the aftermath. Quickly, the situation escalates as you find yourself investigating what is shown to be only one piece of a far larger plan...

Face a variety of enemies in either random encounters of in the overworld, climbing your way up to their leader!



Find weapons and armour for your character, with sprites that change and adapt to your equipped armour!



Unlock powerful skills to help your offence, defence and movement in the bullet-hell style combat, with each of the three styles of magic excelling in their domains!



Restore the light of the Lumiars for extra skill points, and perhaps something more…

item.title: Hyper Mirror Run
item.description:
About This Game

🚀 Race head-to-head in the exciting world of HYPER MIRROR RUN. Compete locally against your friends or challenge an AI opponent. Navigate through mirrored worlds, mastering precision jumps and wielding weapons to triumph over foes. Dive into this 2D platformer for fast-paced action and a lot of fun!

🏆 Conquer every challenge, vanquish enemies, and face powerful bosses at the end of each of the 5 unique worlds. Strategically collect gems to earn extra lives, enhancing your chances to defeat your opponent.

key Features:


  • 🕹️ 55 Engaging Levels: Traverse meticulously designed levels across 5 distinct worlds.
  • 🆚 Versus Mode: Compete locally against your friends in thrilling head-to-head matches.
  • ⚙️ Single-Player Variety: Choose from 3 difficulty levels in single-player mode to tailor the challenge.
  • 🎨 Unique Retro Visuals: Immerse yourself in the captivating retro pixel art and vibrant visual style, choosing from a variety of cute character skins that allow you to express your unique style and flair.
  • 🎮 Precise and Enjoyable Controls: Experience controls that are both precise and enjoyable, allowing you to master every move with finesse.
  • 🎵 Exclusive Soundtrack: Enjoy an engaging gaming experience with an original soundtrack composed for the game, including immersive melodies.

HYPER MIRROR RUN offers an unparalleled blend of action, strategy, and platforming. Are you ready to conquer the mirrored challenge?

item.title: Seqitaire
item.description:
About This Game

Sharpen your mental math and logic skills with this new and unique number game! Seqitaire combines math, pattern-matching, and card-draw mechanics of Solitaire to bring you a fresh gaming experience.

Game Play:

Add, subtract, multiply, or divide using number tiles in a tile grid to produce the specified number. Be wary of what tiles you select though, as each tile is associated with a suit: diamonds ♦️, clubs ♣️, hearts ♥️, spades ♠️, or wild. Cards drawn from a deck determine the target number and other criteria for math submissions. For example, in addition to outputting the number 2, the tiles submitted may need to be all of the hearts suit, use at least one multiplication operator, or be submitted by swiping (i.e. click and dragging to connect adjacent tiles) only. Cards become earned after submitting all of the number results for the given card. Earn all of the cards in the deck to win the game!

How is Seqitaire like Solitaire? Just as card stacks in Solitaire must alternate between black (♣️♠️) and red (♦️♥️) suits or must be ordered in numerical sequence, certain cards in Seqitaire require selected tiles to alternate between black and red suits, or form a "Run" where the number tiles are consecutive when rearranged in numerical order. **Every game of Seqitaire is unique since all the tiles are generated randomly, giving the game high replay value. Like Solitaire, not every level is beatable on the first try, and your success depends partially on skill and partially on the tiles available. The tiles disappear after being used, so the challenge is to maximize points by using as many tiles as possible in number submissions, while still being able to earn all of the cards with the tiles available.

**NEW: Option has been added to play each level with preset tiles instead of randomly-generated tiles. The preset tiles have been designed so that each level has multiple solutions, while levels played with randomly-generated tiles are not guaranteed to be solvable. User data is saved separately for each level based on whether the random tiles option is toggled on or off, and separate Steam leaderboards apply based on this setting as well.

Key Features:

  • 10 individually-crafted levels (more coming!) including 9 untimed levels and 1 timed level
  • Submit math equations by selecting tiles in a tile grid to output the number specified by cards drawn from a deck
  • Tiles can be selected individually or by swiping (clicking and dragging to connect adjacent tiles). Swiping earns bonus points
  • 12 unique card conditions for varied game play
  • Single and multiple card draw from card deck (see explanation below)
  • Partial keyboard support (selecting tiles by swiping not currently supported)

Multiple Card Draw:

The multiple card draw mechanic functions similarly to the way cards are drawn from the deck in a game of Solitaire. Either 2 or 3 cards are drawn at a time and are revealed in a stacked configuration. The top-most card must be earned before the underlying cards can be earned.

Seqitaire is a great math game for adults looking to train their brain or children learning arithmetic. Most new players are able to learn to play Seqitaire quickly without completing the game tutorial, so do not be daunted by the appearance of complex rules. At the end of the day, Seqitaire is a fun and addictive game that can be enjoyed by both math nerds and casual gamers alike.

item.title: Walls of Rust
item.description:
About This Game

Otherwordly threats keep spawning from the depths of the earth and resistance is hanging by a thread. In Walls of Rust you're tasked with defending the area of the gameboard from a constant tide of enemies. With special skills and a deck of cards, command your mech units to destroy the growths before they can corrupt the land.

Key Features

  • Deckbuilding: Expand and modify your deck of cards to adapt to a different enemy pool each run. Unlock new cards to build your starting deck from.
  • Hex-based Tactics: Enemies spawn each turn, and they have to be destroyed before they time out. Firstly however, your Mechs need to be in range of them. Balance movement and aggression to control the gameboard consisting of hexagonal tiles. Plan ahead, so your units are ready to face each following turn.
  • Upgrades & Special Skills: Power up your mechs with unique upgrades and extra resources for additional effects & actions. Choose Special Skills to compliment your deck and units to survive the onslaught.
  • Ultimate Tests: In addition to normal enemies, you'll also face 4 different bosses each run, randomized from a pool. Defeat each one's special challenges to achieve victory.

item.title: Plastomorphosis
item.description:
About This Game

⧉ Ｐｌａｓｔｏｍｏｒｐｈｏｓｉｓ⧉ – retro horror game that tells a story about an ordinary citizen who was evacuated to Modern-City, trying to survive and embrace the new reality as a «new citizen».


⧉Attention citizens!⧉


You arrived in Modern-City, the safest city on the Continent.



  • The Government of the Sovereign in the Nexus Tower and its' equipment provide protection against any release of dark energy of Re.Surs, therefore, to avoid an emergency, each newcomer must be screened for residual dark energy radiation.
  • Please enjoy your stay, but to make your evacuation process more comfortable follow the Instructions of the Administration and Soldiers of Sovereign.
  • Please follow these instructions and have a very safe day!

⧉ＡＮＮＯＵＮＣＥＭＥＮＴ＿ＦＡＩＬＵＲＥ＿ＡＮＴＩＳＯＣＩＡＬ＿ＡＣＴＩＶＩＴＹ＿ＤＥＴＥＣＴＥＤ⧉

⧉During the screening process, you will discover:⧉

  • immersion into a surreal and atmospheric reality
  • experience inspired by retro survival horror titles: fixed (aka cinematic) camera angles, tank controls (modern-one will be available too)
  • various puzzles, cryptic and not-so-cryptic events
  • simulating early 2000s graphics (like cross-gen PS1/PS2 looks), but also using modern post-processing to boost the retro look with fancy effects

item.title: Cosmic Slime Defense
item.description:
About This Game

Embark on an otherworldly adventure with a cosmic slime as your guide. In the tranquil realms of the spiritual forests, your amorphous companion wanders peacefully until the arrival of extraterrestrial beings. These intergalactic invaders seek to harvest the souls of the sacred trees that sustain cosmic balance.

As you reach higher levels, the number of monsters will increase. Remember that killing them will provide you with valuable resources, use them to improve your skills and enhance the power of your cosmic slime.

Navigate the platforms taking advantage of the terrain to gain strategic advantages in your battle. Jump and maneuver quickly, using the environment to outwit your enemies.

During your adventure you will be accompanied by cosmic sound effects provided by zapsplat that will make your experience more immersive.

Survive the growing waves of adversaries and use your skills to eliminate threats before they extinguish the essence of your cosmic existence. Remember, the protagonist slime stands as the defender of the cosmos, fighting valiantly to ensure another day of existence.

item.title: VGMP
item.description:
About This Software

VGMP is an audio analyzer and music player with unique features specialized for video game music. It offers seamless looping audio playback, which emulates how BGMs are played in video games, and a mechanism to algorithmically search for seamless loop points in audio tracks.

As an audio production tool, VGMP can be used to search for seamless loop points, test the seamlessness of loop points, export loop points data, and export audio with various loop-related options.

As a music player, VGMP can be used for seamless looping audio playback, free from the imprecision of the "A-B repeat" feature found in many other music players. It can loop an audio track perpetually or a set number of times. It supports live transition between alternate versions of the same audio track as found in some video games. It can also organize audio tracks into various groups and sub-groups.

Key Features:

  • Perpetual seamless looping audio playback with sample/microsecond-level precision for audio looping, as in video games.
  • Finite seamless looping audio playback, extending the audio track by the number of loops set by the user.
  • Live cross-fade transition between two audio tracks with the same duration, allowing audio playback to continue from one track to the other without resetting the duration.
  • Algorithmically search in an audio track for loop points, test the seamlessness of the results, and then pick one pair of loop points to be assigned to that audio track and used for seamless looping audio playback.
  • Manually assign loop points to an audio track to be used for seamless looping audio playback.
  • Categorize audio tracks by series, installment, and category. Each series/installment can have its own associated banner and/or icon/thumbnail images.
  • Export as a spreadsheet file the loop points data of all audio tracks with assigned loop points.
  • Export an audio track with assigned loop points, with the following options:
    • As three separate audio files, each respectively containing one of the following sections: pre-loop, loop, post-loop
    • The loop section of the audio track.
    • Extended by the number of loops set by the user.

Supported Audio Formats:

AIFF, AAC-LC (.m4a), ALAC (.m4a), FLAC, MP3, OGG (Vorbis), OPUS, WAV (PCM)

item.title: Train to Nowhere
item.description:
About This Game

A young family decides to move away to a different town after the death of their daughter. The only thing separating them from their bright future is a long train ride. What could go wrong?

A breathtaking story of a young man who is starting to realize that not everything is as it seems. Ghostly train is giving goosebumps, surrounding environment is terrifying.

Interesting riddles, character interactions and story immersion. Will he be able to escape this train? What's going to happen in the end? This man's destiny is in your hands. What decision are you going to make?

•immersion in the plot with the help of notes and videotapes
•mysterious plot
•the ending depends on the player
•finding and using items
•russian voice acting

item.title: Drop Pane : Not Only Match-3
item.description:
About This Game

According to cognitive psychology, searching for targets in space can be categorized into parallel and serial searches. Parallel search, an automated process, can handle multiple targets simultaneously at a constant speed regardless of their numbers. Serial search requires the conscious intervention at a slower but more flexible speed. Through training, some serial search actions can be automated, reducing response time.

For the two different search methods, Drop Pane: Not Only Match-3 is designed with three gameplays: Match-3, Symmetrical Elimination, and Spell Elimination. Each of them consists of 19 levels in which the falling speed of the piece gradually increases. After completing level 9, you can unlock the optional Obstacle Block Mode, which randomly adds obstacle blocks to the playfield each time when you level up. Users can choose starting speed for levels 1 to 9 and starting height of obstacle blocks for levels 1 to 12, and unlock more obstacle block gameplay after completing the corresponding missions.

Color search exemplifies parallel processing. The match-3 mechanics, eliminating the blocks same color, tap into our intuitive understanding of color and enable the attention to concentrate on the arrangement of colored blocks. As a results, more pleasurable experience is obtained through continuous elimination.

Symmetric patterns gameplay requires to more conscious intervention. Symmetry is aligned with our aesthetic preferences, but identifying symmetrical targets is not an automatic process. Confirming symmetrical patterns' existence and guiding falling blocks to suitable positions require the storage and processing of substantial information in short-term memory. Successfully tackling this challenge demonstrates the competence in those professions demanding broad attentions, such as programming.

Beyond short-term memory usage, spell elimination gameplay involves extracting spelling information from long-term memory. Vocabulary, extraction speed, and attention span collectively influence on game performance, making it a gameplay style that demands on high intellectual comprehensive qualities.

The game's three modes form a progression from automated processing to complete conscious intervention. By continuous, incremental challenges completion, some serial processing tasks can be automated. As game performance improves, attention span and vocabulary extraction ability can be sustained and enhanced.

Please give your valuable comments on the game, I will always listen and improve the game, especially the spell elimination part. Since English is not my native language, it's hard for me to judge whether the difficulty is suitable for native users. My e-mail address is LarkDream@163.com, Please let me hear your suggestions, thanks!

Wishing you an enjoyable gaming experience and benefitting from the game!

item.title: Anomaly Agent
item.description:
About This Game



Become Agent 70 and stop the anomalies threatening to destroy the balance of the world!

  • Use extraordinary anomaly weapons to toss your opponents around! Overcome your enemies using melee techniques or deadly firearms!

  • Modify your gameplay by upgrading your character in different ways.

  • Escape your pursuers with acrobatic moves.

  • Shape how the story unfolds. Unravel the mysteries you face and make the world a safer place... or plunge it into disaster.

With memorable characters, unique Anomaly Bosses, a story full of twists, and smooth gameplay, Anomaly Agent is an adventure to be savored. We hope you enjoy your journey!

item.title: AlchePot
item.description:
About This Game

A fantastic but difficult Bullet Hell.

- Bullet Absorb -
You can absorb enemy bullets by stop firing, for each bullet you absorbed, energy points will be got.
Note that some of the bullets are too hard to be absorbed.

- Energy System -
Your attack is enhanced with energy gauge. Once you use it up, get it by killing enemies and absorbing bullets.

- Multiple abilities -
Player abilities will be unlocked throughout levels. For each wave of yellow-marked enemies you killed, your experience gets refreshed.

item.title: Saga of the Moon Priestess
item.description:
About This Game

Explore a mystical world in classic top-down style and save the kidnapped prince!



Tragedy strikes the world of Lunaria as the illustrious prince is kidnapped by an unknown assailant! The well-being of the land itself now rests in the hands of a young hero, Sarissa, as she has to fight, explore and figure out how to rescue the young prince. Armed with nothing but her trusty spear and the miraculous ability to communicate with the Goddess of the Moon, she must overcome treacherous enemies and dark dungeons.

Saga of the Moon Priestess is a retro top-down action-adventure inspired by 8-bit and 16-bit classics. Featuring crisp pixel art and original sounds and music, Saga of the Moon Priestess invokes a simpler era of the action-adventure genre. With 5 dungeons to explore, 7 life containers, 15 items to collect and countless enemies to defeat, the world of Lunaria is a land lush with things to do, secrets to find and people to talk to.



Features:

  • Embark on an old-school action adventure through the world of Lunaria!
  • Guide a young hero named Sarissa as she searches for a kidnapped prince.
  • Wield a spear and fight to gain new abilities as you explore forests, grasslands, dungeons and more!
  • Manage gear, collect health upgrades and discover useful tools.
  • Pick up rocks as improvised weapons and use other parts of the environment to your advantage!

item.title: Picker Bot 42
item.description:
About This Game

Explore, discover items, find Wassie lore, upgrade PB42 to gloriously defeat mutant plants and fly back home

PB42


Your peaceful work assignment goes wrong as your navigation system gets damaged by some pesky space debris. Luckily, the picker bot spaceships have one backup route to the Merchant Bay, a big trade hub. After the emergency landing on a seemingly lifeless planet, PB42 discovers that it is full of artifacts from its former inhabitants. A perfect job for a picker bot. But the sound sensors detect some rustle from beneath. Something is lurking…

Upgrade to return home


Platform you way through the underground rift, which changes every time you enter. But listen carefully, as something is lurking in the dark and you as a picker bot are not equipped for those encounters yet. Find and pick up various collectibles, check their values and drop what's worth less, but such precious artifacts will always sell well at the Merchant Bay.
The Merchant Bay offers scrap parts from different types of bots. If you have credits, of course. Thrusters, blasters, homing missiles, illumination, extra durability, you name it. And what’s that over there in the back, behind the gruesome Merchant Wassie? A shiny new navigation system to replace your damaged one? How in the universe can an ordinary picker bot afford it though...
Splurge on a blaster and you want regret it, as those angry mutant plants hold lots of extraordinary artifcats and guard chests with even more valuable loot. And completing the item sets can definitely be lucrative.
Upgrade PB42 into a formidable machine to finally navigate back home.

item.title: Stray：Exotic
item.description:
About This Game

Just as you are about to fall asleep, someone knocks on your door and leaves an invitation to participate in a mysterious trial. And you "volunteered" to participate in the experiment. There are only two things you need to do, and that is to survive and escape.

This is a horror puzzle game, this game doesn't have to jump kill, you have to solve simple puzzles, you have to find the differences in the room, you have to hide from unknown monsters in the dark and escape from here. Even if it looks safe, it's not necessarily safe, so try to survive.

The game currently has 5 levels (with more to come)

item.title: Aviators
item.description:
About This Game

DISCOVER THE HISTORY OF POLISH AIR FORCES DURING WORLD WAR II

Take role of a Polish aviation ace from World War II and engage in aerial battles with the Luftwaffe! Learn the story of the legendary Polish 1586 Special Destiny Squadron. Rush to help the Warsaw Uprising by participating in the reconstruction of the night flight on August 16-17, 1944.

"Aviators" is an educational adventure game in first-person mode, incorporating skill elements and logical riddles. The storyline is based on real events and characters of Polish aviators serving in the air during World War II. Explore the journal module containing a compendium of historical knowledge referenced in "Aviators."

The game for Windows PC is available in Polish, English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Chinese, Japanese, Ukrainian, Russian, Uzbek, and Polish and American Sign Language.

DISCOVER THE LEGENDS OF POLISH AVIATION, JOIN IN AERIAL BATTLES

The game is divided into 6 missions featuring authentic characters from World War II, including Jan Zumbach, Stanisław Skalski, Anna Leska, Jadwiga Piłsudska, Leszek Owsiany, Włodzimierz Bernhardt. Learn about their fates and participate in their incredible missions. Repel the attacks of the German air force, operate devices on board the Halifax MK, communicate with the local partisan unit „Armia Krajowa”, and assist the Warsaw Uprising! Break through the German A2 fortifications, destroy 88 mm artillery positions, and complete the mission with a car escape

Feel the Magic Of the Game's Soundtrack

"The Aviators' Suite" is an intricate series of compositions inspired by the genius of Karol Szymanowski and Mieczysław Karłowicz, composed by Przemysław Treszczotka. The entire suite makes up an immersive project that will captivate not only aviation enthusiasts!

item.title: Escape The Aquarium
item.description:
About This Game

This is a world fabricated by mysterious creatures
Explore the box court level and find the corresponding puzzle solving items
Escape this strange place before exhaustion!


But be careful of the invisible countdown



If you are injured, you need to replenish your supplies in a timely manner


A slightly retro style
The double ending of "not wasting too much of your time"

item.title: Toribash Next
item.description:
About This Game

THE NEXT GREAT FIGHTING GAME

Toribash Next is the sequel to Toribash, the award-winning turn-based sandbox fighting game. Toribash revolutionized the genre by allowing players to create their own moves during a match, using easy-to-understand 3D physics tools. Toribash Next takes fighting games to the next level with weapons, four-player battles and a new replay editor, plus more of the customization and modding options that made the original game a fan favorite.

WHERE WILL YOU STRIKE NEXT?

Challenge your friends to a bloody four-player free-for-all, or team up for freestyle tricking and parkour exhibitions. Change the rules, spawn items and even alter the environment right in the middle of a match. Create epic martial-arts replays by editing in new moves after the fact. Toribash Next gives you the freedom to make the moves you’ve dreamed of making... and play the way you’ve dreamed of playing!

FEATURES

• Innovative turn-based gameplay with 3D body movement and
physics
• 20 different articulation points that can be manipulated in each
turn (21 with weapons)
• Game modes include Classic, Samurai Fight, Aikido and Gun
Duel
• All-new 3- and 4-player modes, including team fights and freefor-all
• Equippable weapons including guns, swords and staves
• New Replay Editor lets you return to any point in a completed
fight and change the outcome
• Wide variety of character, environment and rule customizations
• In-game economy: Buy and sell custom characters and mods
• Player-hosted servers

item.title: Watch The Fish
item.description:
About This Game

Keep the fish water in jar as long as possible ! Watch The Fish is an arcade game where you have to show your dexterity to manage the fish water and get the best possible score. Choose to turn the wheel of fortune at your own risk.

Features

  • Fishes
  • World leaderboard of goldfish lovers
  • Stats and achievements
  • Constantly increasing entropy controlled by an invisible force
  • Chill and annoying songs
  • Many fishes
  • Weather events
  • Different endings to unlock
  • Coins, diamonds and many many fishes !

For Steam Deck players

For a unique gaming experience, the fishjar angle can be controlled by the console gyroscope. Please make a try.
Enable it in Steam Input by selecting a "Gamepad with Gyro" profile.
The gyro should act as the right joystick and always be activated (check the Gyro settings).
